itemincludesprecisiondesignuniversallcds: Precision Design Universal LCD Screen Protectors Keep your LCD screen clean and protected from scratches. This package contains 3 Universal LCD Screen Protectors that can be easily cut to size, attached and removed. Each piece protects your LCD screen from scratches and wear, and reduces glare for enhanced viewing. A squeegee card is also included to make application even easier, and to reduce air bubbles. These screen protectors can be used on a variety of electronic devices including digital cameras, camcorders, cell phones, handheld video games, and more. Key Features: Prevents scratches and wear Reduces glare Helps to maintain LCD and product warranty Can be trimmed to fit any size LCD screen (up to 5 inches diagonally)

itemincludesimagerecalldigitalimagerecov: DigitalImage Recovery Software Recover deleted or corrupted images from your memory cards! ImageRecall is the ultimate quick and easy to use image recovery software. With this easy-to-use program, you can recover deleted or corrupt picture and video files from all types of Memory Cards and USB drives. Users can also scan memory cards for damage, make backups, securely erase cards, and burn recovered files to CD or DVD. Key Features: Easy to use -- just install the software, insert your memory card, and follow the instructions Recovers all popular file formats including RAW & JPG Works with ALL brands and types of memory cards

itemincludes1yearsubscriptiontooutdoorph: 1-Year Subscription to Outdoor Photography Magazine Your #1 Guide for Better Outdoor Photography is the premier magazine about outdoor photography. A one-year subscription is included as part of your purchase... that's Outdoor Photographer 11 issues packed with valuable tips, tricks and news about nature photography, conveniently delivered to your door! A prepaid Subscription Voucher Card will be included with your order, which will activate your subscription when mailed to Outdoor Photography. The first of your eleven issues will then be sent to your address (USA and Canadian addresses only) in about 10 weeks. One subscription per household. Outdoor Photography's technique articles are geared to helping you capture the best wildlife, travel and outdoor sports photography. Review photography tips and keep up with digital photography as applied to nature photography, and stay current with the latest in photography equipment. You can also explore readers' favorite places that offer the best in photography locations.
